attributes.action: permit petitions that seem (to the unenlightened) to be "intended to be humorous."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As you can not determine a petitioner's intent (unless you have some kind of mind-reading ability, which I doubt, or you monitor us all 24 hours a day, which would't surprise me at all) you can not deny me a petition on these grounds.
To do so would be undemocratic.
Are we now living under a fascist dictatorship or something?

rejection.details: Please send comments on the petitions system to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
